tool_description: Basic mathematic operations served through a Restful API
name: MathAAS
title: MathAAS

api_list.name: getDivision
api_list.description: Divides two numbers (dividend and divisor) provided as parameters

required_parameters.name: divisor
required_parameters.description: The second term in a division: <dividend> / <divisor>

required_parameters.name: dividend
required_parameters.description: The first term in a division: <dividend> / <divisor>
